talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>My mom...<sp:5:0:0>asked me to help.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>My brother is a little bit unreliable, so...<sp:5:0:0>
I've gotta keep an eye on him. <sp:5:0:0>That's what
my mom said.
<snd:Sad_00>Um, but...<sp:5:0:0> Keep that between us, 'K?<sp:5:0:0>
If he found out, he'd get really mad <sp:5:0:0>and
puff up his cheeks like an Octorok.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>I wanna train and get super strong so I
can handle any situation!

<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>To start, I need a bunch of spear practice!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad_01>My brother...<sp:5:0:0>is a lot like my mom. That
means he might get restless all of a
sudden and go off somewhere all alone.
I know I've gotta be the responsible one.<sp:5:1:0>
It's just...<sp:5:0:0>if he runs off...<sp:5:1:0>I don't know if
I'll be able to stop him.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I wonder if...<sp:5:0:0>this is how my dad feels,
having to worry about mom so much.

I sure hope my mom comes home soon...
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_01>*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> I wish mom would just come home
already.

I can't stop my brother from being bad...<sp:5:0:0>
Not all by myself, at least.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Ease_01>I'm so glad <sp:5:0:0>that my mom came back!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know, her being gone showed me I've
got some growing left to do.

<snd:Angry_00>I wanna train and get super strong so I
can handle any situation!
